channel.title: Welcome! on Personal website
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Personal website

item.title: Leave me a message
item.description: ** Contact page don’t contain a body, just the front matter above. See form.html in the layouts folder. Formspree requires a (free) account and new form to be set up. The link is made on the final published url in the field: Restrict to Domain. It is possible to register up to 2 emails free and you can select which one you want the forms to go to within Formspree in the Settings tab.

item.title: Using Python and Telethon to access the Telegram API
item.description: During lockdown my friends and I started having regular quiz nights via zoom. The winner of the last quiz would be the host and the others answer questions from varying categories by sending their answers as a text via Telegram to the host. My wife would than copy-paste these answers in an Excel file and evaluate – not a particularly effective process. We thought about shared documents and alike, however, no satisfactory solution was agreed upon.

item.title: cSEM
item.description: cSEM allows users to estimate, analyse, test, and study linear, nonlinear, hierachical and multi-group structural equation models using composite-based approaches and procedures. The focus is one usability and, hence, extremely easy to use. What is cSEM The idea of cSEM is twofold: Provide a unified framework to all common composite-based SEM approaches, including typical postestimation procedures. In principal, it should be similar to what lavaan does for covariance-bases/factor-based SEM.
